imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Safran logo wordmark on transparent background, tightly cropped and scaled to fit (safran-logo.dim_220x64.png)

## Edit Images
- Use the uploaded image as the source and produce the app asset (png-clipart-safran-electronics-defense-labinal-logo-aerospace-outils-text-logo-thumbnail.png > safran-logo.dim_220x64.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the existing Safran header logo asset with the user-provided image, keeping the public path unchanged: `/assets/generated/safran-logo.dim_220x64.png` (as used by `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx`). The resulting image must be a clean, properly cropped/scaled logo that fits within 220x64 and renders clearly on both light and dark backgrounds (transparent background if possible).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remplacer l'image « safran » par la nouvelle image fournie par l'utilisateur

projectName: Replace Safran logo image with user-provided file
